title: Making a Monster
description: The true story of the notorious Bluth family and growing up beneath an umbrella of dysfunction.
quote: Is anyone else worried she’s ruining us?
starring: Taran Killam, Cobie Smulders, Thomas Barbusca, Owen Vaccaro, Steele Stebbins, Savannah Kennick, Jean Smart
altHero: Cobie Smulders as young Lucille Bluth, covering her mouth in horror as young Buster stands in front of her
alt1: young Michael Bluth in his banana stand uniform
alt2: young Lindsay and G.O.B. Bluth, ready for the beach
alt3: young Buster admires a tetherball while wearing a collar with a leash
alt4: Jean Smart as Mimi, Lucille’s mother, looking at George with disgust
